long_description: Perfect for tough runs in warm weather, the Nike Miler Singlet offers recycled, high-performance fabric and protection from the sun. Recycled Dri-FIT(R) fabric delivers high-tech moisture management to keep you cool and dry, and feels soft and comfortable against your skin. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Mesh fabric along the back increases breathability. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light; a reflective loop on center back manages earphones cord. The Nike Miler Singlet features flatlock side seams for flexibility and to reduce chafing.
short_description: Perfect for tough runs in warm weather, the Nike Miler Singlet offers recycled, high-performance fabric and protection from the sun.
